sentences.en: A Persian rug covered the hardwood floors.
sentences.cn: 硬木地板上铺着一张波斯地毯。

sentences.en: Alexander was free to go on with the Persian campaign.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大放手出征波斯.

sentences.en: He knows nothing about Persian art; that's quite outside his province.
sentences.cn: 他对波斯艺术一窍不通, 那不是他的本行.

sentences.en: He recollected Cronshaw's whimsical metaphor of the Persian carpet.
sentences.cn: 他回忆克朗肖经常谈起的那个波斯地毯的寓言.

sentences.en: In California, Persian walnuts were first grown in the days of the early Spanish missions.
sentences.cn: 早在西班牙教区时代,加利福尼亚就首次栽培了核桃.

sentences.en: Iran was key to the balance in the Persian Gulf.
sentences.cn: 伊朗是保持波斯湾平衡的关键.

sentences.en: Large crowds stood in the space between the Persian cavalry.
sentences.cn: 大批群众挤满了波斯骑兵中间的空隙.

sentences.en: Such is the texture of Persian history.
sentences.cn: 这就是波斯历史的梗概.

sentences.en: The extreme case of favorable physical resource endowments is, of course, the Persian Gulf oil states.
sentences.cn: 有幸得到天赋物质资源好处的极端例子自然是波斯湾各产油国了.

sentences.en: The Persian Gulf is rich in petroleum.
The quaint Persian city has been engulfed by a roaring metropolis.
sentences.cn: 那富有奇趣的波斯城市已经被一座喧嚣的大都会所吞没.

sentences.en: They approved a $1.1 billion package of pay increases for the veterans of the Persian Gulf War.
sentences.cn: 他们通过了对参加过波斯湾战争的老兵增发共计11亿美元的一揽子提案。

sentences.en: They resumed their journey when the rains ended and continued by land from the Persian Gulf.
sentences.cn: 雨季过后,他们又重新航行,再在波斯湾登陆,由陆地继续前进.

sentences.en: Three hundred brave Greeks held off a Persian army of a million men.
sentences.cn: 三百个勇敢的希腊人抵御住了一百万个波斯人的进攻.

sentences.en: Twenty thousand Persian soldiers had fallen before that handful of men.
sentences.cn: 两万波斯士兵败在这一小队人面前.
